scripts.clean: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && yarn cache clean
scripts.reset: yarn run purge && yarn run clean && yarn
scripts.prettier-oncommit: git diff --name-only | grep '.*\.js$' | xargs prettier --single-quote --print-width 80 --no-semi --trailing-comma es5 --write
scripts.reverse: adb reverse tcp:7007 tcp:7007 && adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081 && adb reverse tcp:4000 tcp:4000
scripts.shake: $ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools/adb devices | grep '\t' | awk '{print $1}' | sed 's/\s//g' | xargs -I {} $ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools/adb -s {} shell input keyevent 82
scripts.yojee-dev-android-debug: cd android && ./gradlew installYojeeDevDebug && cd .. && npm run reverse
scripts.yojee-dev-ios-fabric: npm run bump:version && cd ios && fastlane yojeeDev
scripts.yojee-staging-android-debug: cd android && ./gradlew installYojeeStagingDebug && cd .. && npm run reverse
scripts.yojee-staging-ios-fabric: npm run bump:version && cd ios && fastlane yojeeStaging
scripts.yojee-demo-android-debug: cd android && ./gradlew installYojeeDemoDebug && cd .. && npm run reverse
scripts.yojee-demo-ios-fabric: npm run bump:version && cd ios && fastlane yojeeDemo
scripts.yojee-product-android-debug: cd android && ./gradlew installYojeeProdDebug && cd .. && npm run reverse
scripts.yojee-product-ios-fabric: npm run bump:version && cd ios && fastlane yojeeProd
scripts.scharff-dev-ios-fabric: npm run bump:version && cd ios && fastlane scharffDev
scripts.scharff-staging-ios-fabric: npm run bump:version && cd ios && fastlane scharffStaging
scripts.scharff-demo-ios-fabric: npm run bump:version && cd ios && fastlane scharffDemo
scripts.scharff-product-ios-fabric: npm run bump:version && cd ios && fastlane scharffProd

scripts.tasman-demo-android-release: cd android && ./gradlew assembleTasmanDemoRelease && cd .. && npm run reverse
scripts.tasman-demo-ios-fabric: npm run bump:version && cd ios && fastlane tasmanDemo
scripts.tasman-dev-android-debug: cd android && ./gradlew installTasmanDevDebug && cd .. && npm run reverse
scripts.tasman-dev-android-release: cd android && ./gradlew assembleTasmanDevRelease && cd .. && npm run reverse
scripts.tasman-dev-ios-fabric: npm run bump:version && cd ios && fastlane tasmanDev

scripts.tasman-prod-android-release: cd android && ./gradlew assembleTasmanProdRelease && cd .. && npm run reverse
scripts.tasman-prod-ios-fabric: npm run bump:version && cd ios && fastlane tasmanProd
scripts.ups-demo-android-debug: cd android && ./gradlew installUpsDemoDebug && cd .. && npm run reverse
scripts.ups-demo-android-release: cd android && ./gradlew assembleUpsDemoRelease && cd .. && npm run reverse

scripts.ups-dev-android-debug: cd android && ./gradlew installUpsDevDebug && cd .. && npm run reverse

scripts.ups-staging-android-debug: cd android && ./gradlew installUpsStagingDebug && cd .. && npm run reverse
